data: The gulch ran in a trough of beauty to the foot of Jones’s Hill, which rose in a sweeping curve into the clouds.
The gulch ran in a trough of beauty to the foot of Jones's Hill, which rose in a sweeping curve into the clouds.
The Mascot of Sweet Briar Gulch
Phillips, Henry Wallace, 1869-1930; Cootes, F. Graham (Frank Graham), 1879-1960 [Illustrator]
